app.description: Find depth at specific position in a list of BAM files. My colleague Estelle asked: in all the BAM we sequenced, can you give me the depth at a given position ?

option.name: positionStr
option.description: -p chrom:pos . Multiple separated by space. Add this chrom/position. Required

option.name: positionFile
option.description: File containing positions. if file suffix is '.bed': all positions in the range will be scanned.

documentation.h:pre:
$ find ./ -type f -name "*.bam" |\ java -jar dist/findallcoverageatposition.jar -p "chr2:1234"
